name: The Sentinels (itch) (Origami Sword)
description:
The Sentinels

Finding herself in an empty lab room, Catarina must make her way through rooms guarded by metallic giants.

Controls
  • Movement: Arrows
  • Interact: X or Space Bar
Credits

Game made by André L. Alvares and Leonardo Santos for WASM-4 Jam #2. Written in nelua programming language, it's available at codeberg.
